mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_NO, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, e.EMPATHY_ARRAY, e.CNT_ARRAY FROM BOARD b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.BOARD_NO, LISTAGG( a.EMPATHY_STATUS_CD, ',' ) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY a.EMPATHY_STATUS_CD) AS EMPATHY_ARRAY, LISTAGG( a.cnt, ',' ) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY a.cnt) AS CNT_ARRAY FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, EMPATHY_STATUS_CD, COUNT(EMPATHY_STATUS_CD) cnt FROM EMPATHY GROUP BY BOARD_NO, EMPATHY_STATUS_CD ) a GROUP BY BOARD_NO ) e on e.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO;

SELECT BOARD.MEMBER_NO, BOARD.BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "BOARD_CREATE_DT", BOARD_CATEGORY_NM, BOARD_READ_COUNT, MEMBER_FN, IMAGE_PATH, POST_NO FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON(MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = BOARD.MEMBER_NO) JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING (BOARD_CATEGORY_CD) LEFT JOIN IMAGE IMG ON(IMG.BOARD_NO = BOARD.BOARD_NO) JOIN BOARD_STATUS ON (BOARD.BOARD_STATUS_CD = BOARD_STATUS.BOARD_STATUS_CD) JOIN MIND_POST ON( BOARD_STATUS.BOARD_STATUS_CD = MIND_POST.BOARD_STATUS_CD) WHERE BOARD.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD.BOARD_STATUS_CD = 201 AND STATUS_CD = 0 ORDER BY BOARD_CREATE_DT DESC
